## here is a comment
## Merge data?
```{r}
# this is where we merge data
combine <- merge(new_bball_stats, data_advanced, by = c('Player'))

# cut down all predictors to only 24 predictors
selection <- subset(combine, select= -c(2:4,7,9,10,12:14,20, 22,29:31,32,35:47,49:51, 53))
#all_data <- subset(master_data, select= c(1:3,5:28,30,33:44, 46:53))
less_data <- selection %>% relocate(c(PPG,RPG, APG,SPG,BPG,TPG, Minutes.played), .before = MPG)
less_data

# Convert predictors in less_data all to dbl, not chr
conversion <- less_data[,2:21] %>% mutate_if(is.character,as.numeric)
conversion1 <- conversion %>% add_column(master_data$Player) 
names(conversion1)[names(conversion1) == "master_data$Player"] <- "Player"
conversion2 <- conversion1 %>% relocate((Player), .before = Games.Played)
conversion2
```

## filter data
```{r}
# filter players with games played over 10, then filter with total minutes played over 100 
our_data1 <- conversion2 %>% filter(Games.Played >= 10) %>% select(Player:Box.Plus.Minus)
our_data2 <- our_data1 %>% filter(Minutes.played > 100) %>% select(Player:Box.Plus.Minus)
our_data2
```

## Check to see Correlation
```{r}
# correlation to see predictors vs other predictors in our_data2
my_cor <- our_data2 %>% select(c(Games.Played: Box.Plus.Minus)) %>% cor() %>% round(3)
typeof(my_cor)
as.data.frame(my_cor)
```
